Jati Kinsela
Portofolio Internet of Things Engineer Graphic Designer

02
About Me
About Me Electrical Engineering students who graduated from the Jakarta Veteran National Development University who have complete assignments, abilities, and can adapt quickly. I am a person who is enthusiastic, committed and continues to try to find opportunities to continue to develop and be creative. I am known as a creative mastermind, decisive problem solver, and solution-oriented individual. I am known as an individual who is caring, thorough and has solid communication skills. Interested in power, Internet of Things, UI/UX Design and Machine Learning.

07
My Projects
Smart Farming Smart Farming - With ESP32
The smart farming system uses an ESP32 microcontroller and soil moisture, temperature, and air humidity sensors. Crop data is monitored in real-time through smart devices, allowing for efficient control and maintenance.

08
My Projects
Smart Room Smart Room - With ESP32
The room monitoring system uses an ESP32 microcontroller and temperature, humidity, and light sensors. Real-time data is clearly displayed on a smartphone for easy and efficient control.

09
My Projects
Mining Bitcoin Mining Bitcoin - With ESP32 A small-scale Bitcoin mining node using an ESP32 microcontroller, with real-time monitoring and blockchain network connection.

10
My Projects
Local Webserver Local Webserver - With ESP32 The ESP32 microcontroller functions as a local webserver that displays a simple website, accessible via Wi-Fi devices such as laptops or smartphones.
